>
[Caterwaul Sling](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2863)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 242 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 155 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=430)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made of shiny brown leather, this _+1 striking [sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72)_ has a single white thread interwoven into its cord. 

**Activate—Unleash Roar** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Actions.aspx?ID=639),[sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You pull the white thread free, then whirl the sling in circles at high speed. It lets out an ear-piercing wave of sound. Each creature in a 30-foot cone takes 4d6 sonic damage (DC 21 basic Fortitude save). Any creature that fails is [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) for 1 round, or 1 hour on a critical failure. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
